Text: Thank you very much for your time and effort to share this with us.
this is not 1080p. i was thinking people with purple skull are trusted?

Why is it that every torrent has one stupid commentator who keeps insisting that 1920 x 816 isn't 1080p??

Listen, 1920 X 500 is still 1080p, got it?? Because its all about aspect Ratio!

ALL theatrical movies when converted to bluRay end up 1920 x 816, because the originaly material is filmed in 1.85:1 aspect ratio, and then converted to HD, so the aspect ratio stays the same and doesn't magically change to 16:9!

Got it now?? What he simply did, is removed the black bars to save space!
